Virus Index

An index of the Virus Discovery Reports.

  • Black Queen Cell Virus - Picornavirus
  • Cripavirus inexspectatus - Dicistrovirus
  • Hemileia pugnator - Mitovirus. -= 99% =-
  • Hemiptinidovirus metis - Nidovirus
  • Hespivirus rivalense - Negevirus -= 99% =-
  • Locarnavirus Nudiformis - Marnavirus
  • Red Mite Associated Hypovirus 1
  • Sedimentum occultus - Picornavirus
  • Vermisvirus culicis - Negevirus
  • Insert Virus Name Here ...

Project Organization

â¦¿ VIRUSxDISCVRY
â”œâ”€â”€ tools/                   # Virus Discovery Tools Tutorials ================
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ <toolnameA>.md      # Upload your completed tutorial into this folder
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ serratusexplorer.md # Example Tutorial for using Serratus.io Explorer
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ toolTemplate.md     # Template Markdown file for writing the tutorial
â”‚                            # for your assigned <toolname>
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ img/<toolname>/     # For each <toolname>, supporting data or image
â”‚                            # files are in a seperate directory
â”‚        
â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€ virus/                   # Virus Discovery Reports ========================
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ <virusname>.md      # Upload your completed virus discovery report
â”‚   â”‚                        # into this folder
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ virTemplate.md      # Template Markdown file for uploading your virus
â”‚   â”‚                        # report
â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€ img/<virusname>/    # For each <virusname>, supporting data or image
â”‚                            # files are kept in their own directory named
â”‚                            # after the virus
â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€ README.md                # Project README
â”œâ”€â”€ LICENSE                  # AGPL 3.0 / cc0
â”œâ”€â”€ assignment3.Rmd          # Instructions for Assignment 3
â”œâ”€â”€ tutorial3.Rmd            # Instructions for Tutorial 3
